original_text: And Bezaleel made the ark of shittim wood: two cubits and a half was the length of it, and a cubit and a half the breadth of it, and a cubit and a half the height of it:
korean_text: 브살렐이 조각목으로 궤를 만들었으니 길이가 두 규빗 반, 너비가 한 규빗 반, 높이가 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: And Bezaleel made the ark of shittim wood
two cubits and a half was the length of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 길이는 두 규빗 반 이었고

sentences.original_text: and a cubit and a half the breadth of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 너비는 한 규빗 반 이었으며

sentences.original_text: and a cubit and a half the height of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 높이는 한 규빗 반 이었습니다
